RelatedSentence: The entertainer has an agreement with Penguin Group ( USA ) for a book , her first , about her cathartic 2012 world tour .
The publisher announced Monday that the book will be called True Love .
According to Celebra , the book will be a diary in which Lopez confides her greatest fears and how she overcomes them .
